entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 3.0°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 1.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
